sentence.Network_en: The storm cut a wide swath through the town.
sentence.Network_cn: 暴风雨席卷全城,造成很大的破坏.

sentence.Network_en: The tornado cut a swath through the town.
sentence.Network_cn: 龙卷风袭击该镇,留下破坏的痕迹.

sentence.Network_en: A swath of moonlight in the long garden was mottled over with dark shadows.
sentence.Network_cn: 长条的天井里露出一段月光,中间再涂上一些黑影.

PerfectNetExp.exp: 小水线面双体船(Small Waterplane Area Twin Hull)
PerfectNetExp.abs: 针对小水线面双体船(SWATH)的不足,提出了新型双体、三体船型.通过模型试验方法,对上述船型的阻力性能进行了研究.结果表明,新型 …
美国海军第一艘大型小水线面双体船型(SWATH)水声监听船的设计于1986年完成，被命名“胜利”号(Victorious)，代号为T-AGOS 19。 …

means.word_mean: 1. the space created by the swing of a scythe or the cut of a mowing machine
2. a path or strip (as cut by one course of mowing)
